mapper.update:
update Books
Title = #{title,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Author = #{author,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
PublisherId = #{publisherid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PublishDate = #{publishdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ISBN = #{isbn,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UnitPrice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ContentDescription = #{contentdescription,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
TOC = #{toc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CategoryId = #{categoryid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
